agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Elections TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Monday, April 29, 2019 PLACE: E2.016 CHAIR: Rep. Stephanie Klick HB 377 Lang | et al. Relating to requiring a voter to be affiliated with a political party to vote in that party's primary election or otherwise participate in that party's affairs; creating a criminal offense. HB 1736 Rosenthal Relating to annual applications for ballots to be voted by mail. HB 2552 Bucy Relating to the secretary of state posting on the secretary of state's Internet website a database of certain election information collected from authorities responsible for giving notice of an election. HB 2554 Bucy Relating to regulation of the display of signs containing political advertising. HB 2628 Vo Relating to the manner of reporting and maintaining certain information relating to candidates and election returns. HB 3724 Swanson Relating to the signature required on an application for voter registration or for a ballot to be voted by mail. HB 4128 Swanson Relating to the required vote by a presidential elector and related procedures. HB 4129 Swanson Relating to the omission from the ballot of a withdrawing candidate. Notice of this meeting was announced from the house floor. Bills added after last posting: HB 4128 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
